25:04 Epilepsy results from uncontrolled electrical activity in the brain. 脳の電気的活動が 抑制できない“欠神発作”です
25:10 In a severe, or grand mal, seizure... ...a person may lose consciousness for several minutes... ひどい発作の場合 患者は何分間も意識を失い―
25:15 ...and suffer involuntary contractions of all the muscles of the body. 激しい筋肉の収縮に 苦しみます
25:18 Is it possible for a person suffering such a seizure... 発作中 彼女が言うような 幻覚を見たり―

25:24 The muscle contractions could feel like an extreme pressure on the body. 筋肉の収縮を 圧力と感じるかもしれない
25:28 And it is certainly possible, with all that brain activity... 脳の状態を考えれば 当然―
25:31 ...for a person to perceive all sorts of strange and violent things. 暴力的な体験をしたと 錯覚しても おかしくない
